text: Ezɨma gumazamizir nguibar kamɨn itiba fo, Iesus Jerusalemɨn zui, kamaghɨn amizɨma me Iesus inian aghua.(9:53) Samarian gumazamiziba, me Gerasen Mɨghsɨamɨn uari akuva God bagha ofa gamua Godɨn ziam fe. Ezɨ Judaba Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn ghuava ofa gamua Godɨn ziam fe. Nɨ Jon 4:20ɨn gan. Samarian gumazamiziba ghaze, Judaba deravɨra Ekiamɨn ziam fer arazimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn, me dughiar kam Iesusɨn akurvaghan aghua.
